Title: Aachi & Ssipak
Director: Jo Beom-jin, Zack Keller, Ed Skudder
Writer: Jo Beom-jin, Yeon-won Jeong, Zack Keller
Actors: Nick Ainsworth, Lim Chang-jung, Yang Jeong-hwa
Plot: In a future where energy is made from fecal matter, the government rewards defecation with "juicybars". Small-time hustlers try to get rich while fending off the mutated Diaper Gang.
